responses.text: Watching the diagonals for your mistakes!
A counter-diagonal strikes - you're fucked, white trash!
Monitoring their threats... Your moves are predictable.
This diagonal feels unsafe... Your traps are obvious.
Exposed on the diagonal - shit! You cheated!
Divine shield holds firm - praise the lord, you're doomed!
Praying for resilience against your evil...
Lord, test not my faith with this stupidity...
Forsaken! The shield breaks - god damn it!
The {capturedPiece} is removed from my presence.
Difesa elegante! Elegant defense against your brute force!
Che resistenza! What resistance - you're finished, stronzo!
Pericoloso... dangerous... Your traps are obvious.
Brutta posizione! Ugly position! You aggressive fools.
Nooo! Sono catturato! - holy shit! You cheated!
Controlling defensive squares against your onslaught!
Counter-pressure on the diagonals - die, scum!
Looking for counter-play... Your moves are predictable.
Risky diagonal... Your traps are obvious.
Counter-play is failing! You aggressive fools.
The counter-play collapsed - fuck! You got lucky.
Fighting for freedom from your oppression!
Liberté trouvée! Freedom found - allez vous faire foutre, tyrants!
Seeking active squares... Your moves are predictable.
Risqué... risky... Your traps are obvious.
Mauvais! This is bad! You aggressive fools.
Tragique! Total miscalculation - bordel! You cheated!
Strategic defensive placement against your chaos!
Harmonious defensive setup - you're outmatched, idiot!
Coordinating our defenses... Your moves are predictable.
Coordination slightly off... Your traps are obvious.
Setup is compromised! You aggressive fools.
The harmony shattered - damn it! You cheated!
